name: Stickypowers
description:
Powerups stick to you for life! Or at least till the next level.

WIP stage
Arrow keys to move. spacebar to jump. works with xbox controller, and on mobile too!
Plus increases jump height. minus increases runspeed.

StickyPowers is a tiny game made by Shaheen Sheriff
for the 'Last Minute Change Jam' hosted by 'Humble Toymaker Games'.

Made using Godot, Krita & Beepbox. (11july2020)
Week04 of learning Godot. Tried making something that feels like an actual game. Works on phone too!
